title: spammed left side of keyboard :/ Help description below (Solved)
body:
I'm not very computer savvy and I just spilled a bit of water on the right side of my keyboard. after spamming to get dry quick (side of page up and down ect) my LOL browser was about half the size? how do I change it back to the original size? 
After 5 sec of this post i worked it out, not even figerativly, literly 5 seconds. man I did not even try :P

replies.body: No worries! I'm glad you were able to get that figured out before I was able to get here, but in the future you should be able to adjust that window size with ctrl + and -.
Thanks for the reply :) now i know what i spammed :P
